The 47th Gawad Urian Awards () is held on June 8, 2024. Established in 1976, the Gawad Urian Awards highlights the best of Philippine cinema as decided by the Filipino Film Critics. The best Philippine films for the year 2023 are honored in the event at the De La Salle University. For the first time in the awards-giving body's history, the Best Picture award is conferred to an animated film, Iti Mapukpukaw.
